meta.name: Avengers: Endgame
meta.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

review.name: Best movie I've seen in ages
review.reviewBody: Let me start by saying THIS is how you wrap a saga!!!! I loved this movie, it was an emotional rollercoaster from open to close, and a fitting way to pay tribute to the legend of Stan Lee.

trailer.name: "Policy" Trailer
trailer.description: Every hero, every story, every moment has led us here.

plotText.plainText: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

summary.originalText: Best movie I've seen in ages

originalText.plaidHtml:
Let me start by saying THIS is how you wrap a saga!!!!
I loved this movie, it was an emotional rollercoaster from open to close, and a fitting way to pay tribute to the legend of Stan Lee.

text.plaidHtml: When Avengers: Endgame (2019) passed Titanic (1997)'s box office total, James Cameron sent a congratulatory message to Kevin Feige and Marvel Studios on dethroning his film - with a photo of the Avengers 'A' being the iceberg that sinks the Titanic.
(at around 2h 20 mins) Scott is in the van trying a jump start, we then cut away and he is seen in the background battling a flying monster.

lines.text: If we don't get that stone, billions of people stay dead.
Then I guess we both know who it's got to be.
I'm starting to think we mean different people here, Natasha.
For the last five years I've been trying to do one thing, get to right here. That's all it's been about. Bringing everybody back.
Oh, don't you get all decent on me now.
What, you think I want to do it? I'm trying to save *your* life, you idiot.
Yeah, well, I don't want you to, how's that? Natasha, you know what I've done. You know what I've become.
Well, I don't judge people on their worst mistakes.
You're a pain in my ass, you know that?

lines.stageDirection: they lean their heads together affectionately

lines.text: Tell my family I love them.

lines.stageDirection: she pushes him off and tasers him

text.plaidHtml: When the Marvel logo appears at the end of the closing credits, the sound of a hammer hitting metal can be heard several times (this is the sound of Tony Stark forging his suit in Iron Man (2008), setting in motion the Marvel Cinematic Universe).
In India, all profanity has been muted from the film and the subtitles.
